UmlCanvas Examples

  • Model/Diagram/Class gives an overview of the UmlCanvas API for Models, Diagrams and Classes calls
  • Relations gives an overview of the UmlCanvas API for Relation calls
  • Interface/Inheritance/Realization gives an overview of the UmlCanvas API for Relation calls
  • DSL demonstrates all capabilities of UmlCanvas using its own DSL.
  • Enumeration support is also explicit
  • Security a small diagram with aggregations and classes with attributes and operations
  • Notes a small diagram with notes
  • Generics can also be used.
  • All-in-One tries to show off every aspect of UmlCanvas
  • Custom Routing uses new features from Canvas2D to customize how associations are routed on the diagram.
  • Error reporting shows how to get error feedback.
  • UmlCanvas Inspector, our all-in-one tool.
  • UmlCanvas Remote Inspector loads a diagram hosted on hosted.umlcanvas.org
  • The Smallest UML CASE tool build using UmlCanvas.
  • Building your own UML editor using the Widget Framework
  • HuC API shows you how to interact with Hosted UmlCanvas through the HuC Plugin.
  • State Diagrams are now available.
